snippet: The technology giant said it had acquired Collective Intellect, a social media analysis firm, just a day after Salesforce.com agreed to buy Buddy Media for $689 million.
abstract: The technology giant said it had acquired Collective Intellect, a social media analysis firm, just a day after Salesforce.com agreed to buy Buddy Media for $689 million.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Oracle Buys Collective Intellect to Bolster Social Media Analysis
